revised_title: Bertram Hopkinson: A Pioneering Engineer and Scientist
tldr: This article discusses the life and achievements of Bertram Hopkinson, a prominent engineer and scientist who made significant contributions to teaching and research in engineering sciences and played a crucial role in winning World War I. Hopkinson's work covered various areas, including fluid mechanics, electrical engineering, and mechanical properties of materials. His innovative research methods and dedication to practical problem-solving made him a respected figure in his field.
